description: The Roman Empire during the reign of Augustus, encompassing the Italian peninsula, Gaul, Hispania, and parts of North Africa.  This area represents the core territories under direct Roman rule.
title: Augustinian Rome

description: The region of Macedonia, shared between the Roman Republic and the Ptolemaic Kingdom. It served as a buffer zone between the two empires.
title: Condominium of Macedonia

description: The Ptolemaic Kingdom, encompassing Egypt and territories in the Levant, including Syria, Judea and parts of the Middle East. This area was ruled by the Ptolemaic dynasty.
title: Egyptian Realm
